column4: how do i change the permissions on my external firewire partitions that ubuntu auto mounts for me?
i want to share the partitions on the network
try "man mount" and "man fstab". look for the uid, gid, or umask options for filesystems
what do i do with this information when i get it?
modify your fstab with those options
the firewire drive stuff isn't in my /etc/fstab
